column4: hi.  I've got 2 nVidia GTX 480 video cards.  I haven't been able to get SLI working for FreeBSD/amd64, so I was wondering whether or not it is known to work in Ubuntu?
considered DLing an ISO and trying?
Not may of us have that kind of hardware power to play with...
Most users who spend that kind of hardware money have more bucks than sense.
